content:
I am trying to build the documentation in compiler/rustc_expand by running ./x.py doc compiler/rustc_expand, however I am getting this error: skipping - compiler/librustdoc docs disabled

I am assuming it is something wrong with my config? Anyone have any ideas?
@jakevossen5 you need to set compiler-docs = true in config.toml
are you interested in making a PR to bootstrap to suggest it? should be an easy fix :)

Thanks!

So do you suggest if that skipping - compiler/librustdoc docs disabled we emit something like "try adding compiler-docs = true" ?
Sure, I can take a look at that in a bit. Should I open an issue, or just a PR?

How does

skipping - compiler/librustdoc docs disabled. If you want to build internal compiler documentation, add compiler-docs = true to your config.toml

Sound?
I am trying to think of a more concise way to say it
maybe "skipping - compiler/librustdoc docs disabled (use compiler-docs = true in config.toml to enable)"?
